Title: Chocolat
Writer: Cyril Gely (screenplay), Olivier Gorce (adaptation), Gérard Noiriel (adaptation), Gérard Noiriel (book), Roschdy Zem (adaptation)
Actors: Omar Sy, James Thierrée, Clotilde Hesme, Olivier Gourmet
Plot: The rise and fall of the famous clown Chocolat, the first black circus performer who revolutionised the stagnant circus acts and conquered Paris of the Belle Époque with his exuberance and originality.
